title: 游戏卡死||游戏崩溃
author: Lucky_fish0w0
txt_content:
如题，经常在进出地狱门、进出游戏的时候，CPU占用率突然归零，然后进入了很长时间的无响应状态，偶尔在重装材质包的时候进入永久性的无响应，这时CPU平均占用为25%，而内存一成不变。java信息和系统信息在下列报错里头
有时候在无响应之前，报错就逃了，错误报告如下---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why is it breaking :(

Time: 16-7-30 下午7:41
Description: Ticking screen

java.lang.NullPointerException: Ticking screen
        at eo$a.a(SourceFile:387)
        at eo.m(SourceFile:220)
        at eo.a(SourceFile:229)
        at bls.a(SourceFile:251)
        at bhj.e(SourceFile:116)
        at bcx.t(SourceFile:1601)
        at bcx.av(SourceFile:968)
        at bcx.a(SourceFile:396)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)


A detailed walkthrough of the error, its code path and all known details is as follows:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

-- Head --
Thread: Client thread
Stacktrace:
        at eo$a.a(SourceFile:387)
        at eo.m(SourceFile:220)
        at eo.a(SourceFile:229)
        at bls.a(SourceFile:251)
        at bhj.e(SourceFile:116)

-- Affected screen --
Details:
        Screen name: bhj
Stacktrace:
        at bcx.t(SourceFile:1601)
        at bcx.av(SourceFile:968)
        at bcx.a(SourceFile:396)
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:124)

-- System Details --
Details:
        Minecraft Version: 1.10.2
        Operating System: Windows 8.1 (amd64) version 6.3
        Java Version: 1.8.0_102, Oracle Corporation
        Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
        Memory: 694588832 bytes (662 MB) / 818888704 bytes (780 MB) up to 2093809664 bytes (1996 MB)
        JVM Flags: 8 total; -XX:HeapDumpPath=MojangTricksIntelDriversForPerformance_javaw.exe_minecraft.exe.heapdump -Xmx2G -XX:+UseConcMarkSweepGC -XX:+CMSIncrementalMode -XX:-UseAdaptiveSizePolicy -Xmn512M -XX:+AggressiveOpts -XX:+UseCompressedOops
        IntCache: cache: 0, tcache: 0, allocated: 12, tallocated: 94
        Launched Version: 1.10.2
        LWJGL: 2.9.4
        OpenGL: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 GL version 4.0.0 - Build 10.18.10.4276, Intel

replies.author: ItIsEnderman
replies.txt_content:
显卡居然是集显……好了好了，先试试删除光影，毕竟1.10.2还是新出的版本，Bug难免较多。
我才发现你的签名档的内容居然……233

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
把光影MOD卸掉试试
另外材质用的什么
[s]推荐使用高清修复自带的光影MOD233

内存分配似乎有点高

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content:
阴阳师元素祭祀 发表于 2016-7-31 17:10
把光影MOD卸掉试试
另外材质用的什么
推荐使用高清修复自带的光影MOD233Resource Packs: Is Modded: Probably not. Jar signature remains and client brand is untouched.没有mod和材质包！

replies.author: Arobcher
replies.txt_content: 需要升级下驱动或者显卡是集显还是独显= =

replies.txt_content:
943276573 发表于 2016-8-1 11:03
